com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree

Class Task<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ai.btree.Task<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - type of the blackboard object that tasks use to read or modify game state
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BehaviorTree, BranchTask, Decorator, LeafTask

    @TaskConstraint
public abstract class Task<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    The Task of a behavior tree has one control and a list of children.

      • childRunning

        public void childRunning(Task<E> runningTask,
                         Task<E> reporter)
        This method will be called when one of the ancestors of this task needs to run again
        Parameters:
        runningTask - the task that needs to run again
        reporter - the task that reports, usually one of this task's children

        Returns:
